text: Ambrose Lee Siu-kwong (; 17 August 1948 â€“ 14 August 2022)Ex-security minister, NPC delegate Ambrose Lee dies GBS IDSM was a Hong Kong politician. He was born in then-British Hong Kong. From 1998 to 2002, he was the Director of Immigration. From 2002 to 2003, he was the Commissioner of the Independent Commission Against Corruption. From 2003 to 2010, he was the Secretary for Security. Lee died on 14 August 2022 after falling at his home in Hong Kong, three days before his 74th birthday. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Hong Kong politicians
title: Ambrose Lee
